MEMORANDUM

16 February \%*$
TOs NAEB Board of Directors
FROM: Burton Paulu ,
SUBJECT Comments on Grey don Ausmus* Memorandum of February 7 relative to
NaEB Seminar
X have looked through Gray don's proposal and think it a very good one. In the
earlier stages I was concerned about tills television seminar because it seemed to
me that the area to be covered was at once so broad and so vaguely defined that I
couldn* t see how we could come down to grips with the problems in less than a three
months sessionÂ® hut this brings the matter down to the ground and defines m objective
which could be accomplished by a week's work*
BPiCjm
